KnowledgeBase.Title: Example String isType 001
KnowledgeBase.TypeKeywords:
Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector
FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory
Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex

Example.Description:
These examples check if the argument object is
of the specified type
If it is, the function returns true, otherwise, it returns false.

Syntax.Note: The object is of type String.
The object is of type Text.
Syntax.Hints:
The syntax: (isType String: obj)
is also equivalent to: (isString obj)
